cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saki

sentence.kanji: お先にどうぞ。
sentence.romaji: osakini douzo
sentence.english: Please go ahead.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sengetsu

sentence.kanji: 先月、友達の結婚式があった。
sentence.romaji: sengetsu tomodachi no kekonshiki ga ata
sentence.english: My friend's wedding was held last month.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokuni

sentence.kanji: 特に質問はありません。
sentence.romaji: tokuni shitsumon ha arimasen
sentence.english: I don't particularly have any questions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokubetsu

sentence.kanji: あなたは私にとって特別な人です。
sentence.romaji: anata ha watashi ni tote tokubetsu na hito desu
sentence.english: You're special to me.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's joukyou

sentence.kanji: この状況では出発は難しいです。
sentence.romaji: kono joukyou de ha shupatsu ha muzukashii desu
sentence.english: It will be difficult to depart in these conditions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mazu

sentence.kanji: 帰ったら先ず手を洗いましょう。
sentence.romaji: kaetara mazu te wo araimashou 。
sentence.english: When you get home, wash your hands first.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's arau

sentence.kanji: 早く顔を洗いなさい。
sentence.romaji: hayaku kao wo arainasai
sentence.english: Hurry up and wash your face.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizen

sentence.kanji: みんなで自然を守りましょう。
sentence.romaji: minna de shizen wo mamorimashou
sentence.english: Let's all work to protect Nature.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizen

sentence.kanji: 親が子供を守るのは自然なことだ。
sentence.romaji: oya ga kodomo wo mamoru no ha shizen na koto da
sentence.english: It's natural that parents protect their children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ushi

sentence.kanji: 牛が草を食べています。
sentence.romaji: ushi ga kusa wo tabete imasu
sentence.english: The cow is eating grass.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's inu

sentence.kanji: この犬はとても賢い。
sentence.romaji: kono inu ha totemo kashikoi
sentence.english: This dog is very clever.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's neko

sentence.kanji: 私は猫が大好きです。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha neko ga daisuki desu
sentence.english: I love cats.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's momo

sentence.kanji: 私の一番好きな果物は桃です。
sentence.romaji: watashi no ichiban suki na kudamono ha momo desu
sentence.english: My favorite fruit is peaches.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sakini

sentence.kanji: では、私たちは先に出発します。
sentence.romaji: deha watashitachi ha sakini shupatsu shimasu
sentence.english: Right, we will set off before you.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tokuyuu

sentence.kanji: これは子供に特有の病気です。
sentence.romaji: kore ha kodomo ni tokuyuu no byouki desu
sentence.english: This illness is particular to children.

cards.english: the other day, a few days ago
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's senjitsu

sentence.kanji: 先日の件はどうなりましたか。
sentence.romaji: senjitsu no ken ha dou narimashita ka
sentence.english: What happened about that matter the other day?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's suisen

sentence.kanji: 今はほとんどのトイレが水洗ですよ。
sentence.romaji: ima ha hotondo no toire ga suisen desu yo
sentence.english: Most toilets nowadays flush.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's masaki

sentence.kanji: 合格を真っ先に両親に伝えたの。
sentence.romaji: goukaku wo masaki ni ryoushin ni tsutaeta no
sentence.english: I told my parents first of all that I had passed the exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shizenni

sentence.kanji: 硬くならないで、自然に話して下さい。
sentence.romaji: kataku naranai de shizenni hanashite kudasai
sentence.english: Please speak naturally without being formal.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagame

sentence.kanji: ここからの眺めは最高です。
sentence.romaji: koko karano nagame ha saikou desu
sentence.english: The view from here is fantastic.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's damaru

sentence.kanji: 彼はいつも黙って仕事をします。
sentence.romaji: kare ha itsumo damate shigoto wo shimasu
sentence.english: He always works in silence.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nagameru

sentence.kanji: 猫が窓から外を眺めているよ。
sentence.romaji: neko ga mado kara soto wo nagamete iru yo
sentence.english: The cat is at the window staring outside.
